name: Archaic Petra
description:
When the character uses a Skill or equips a Talent: Spend 1 less Geo Die. (Once per Round)
Roll Phase: 2 of the starting Elemental Dice you roll are always guaranteed to be Geo Dice.
(A character can equip a maximum of 1 Artifact)
descriptionraw: <color=#FFFFFFFF>When the character uses a Skill or equips a {SPRITE_PRESET#3006}Talent:</color> Spend 1 less {SPRITE_PRESET#1106}<color=#FFE699FF>Geo Die</color>. storytext: "While the Millelith stands guard, evil shall never prevail!"
